section.heading: Construction, operation and maintenance of industrial hazardous waste treatment, storage and disposal facilities

content.p:
ยง 1285-c. Construction, operation and maintenance of industrial
hazardous waste treatment, storage and disposal facilities. In addition
to its existing powers, the corporation is hereby empowered to
construct, operate and maintain industrial hazardous waste treatment,
storage and disposal facilities, including plants, works,
instrumentalities, or parts thereof, and appurtenances thereto for the
collection, conveyance, treatment, exchange and disposal of hazardous
wastes provided such a facility receives a certificate of environmental
safety and public necessity as provided in title eleven of article
twenty-seven of the environmental conservation law and is located on
lands in a municipality where such industrial uses are permitted. The
corporation may subcontract for the construction or operation of such
facility.
